snippet.title: BioShock Infinite Beast of America Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit http://www.preordernow.com for more information on the Premium and Ultimate Songbird Edition of BioShock Infinite.

Check out this all-new BioShock Infinite gameplay voted for by the Irrational Facebook community! See more of the streets (and skies) of Columbia, new ways to use your Sky-Hook and how Elizabeth can be your wingman in combat.

ESRB Rating: MATURE - Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Mild Sexual Themes, and Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

http://www.BioShockInfinite.com
http://www.IrrationalGames.com
http://www.facebook.com/BioShock
http://www.twitter.com/IrrationalGames
